Context.Description: Actor creates, modifies, or deletes Libraries.

Preconditions.Description: Actor is logged on and identified by a User.

Trigger.Description: Actor indicates wish to configure Libraries.

Guarantees.Success: A Library is create, modified, or deleted.

MainSteps.Step: Actor indicates wish to create a Library.
System verifies the name is unique.
System creates a Library as specified, and confirms the creation to the actor.

Extension.Description: Actor indicates wish to modify a Library
Extension.Step: System presents a list of the existing Libraries.
System presents the details of the selected Library.
System verifies the name is unique.
System informs the actor that the name is already in use. Processing continues at step 1a4.
System modifies the Library as specified, and confirms the modification to the actor.

Extension.Description: Actor indicates wish to delete a Library
Extension.Step: System presents a list of the existing Libraries.
System prompts for confirmation of deletion.
System deletes the Library, the Library's Media, and the Media's Loan history.
System informs the actor that the name is already in use. Processing continues at step 3.
